headline.print_headline: California Bill Seeks to Curb Sexually Explicit Internet Bullying by Teens
headline.main: California Bill Seeks to Curb Sexually Explicit Internet Bullying by Teens

docs.snippet: Teenagers who share sexually explicit images of others on the Internet to harass them could soon face tougher punishment under California legislation proposed on Friday, spurred by the suicide of a teen after images of her sexual assault were circ...
docs.lead_paragraph: Teenagers who share sexually explicit images of others on the Internet to harass them could soon face tougher punishment under California legislation proposed on Friday, spurred by the suicide of a teen after images of her sexual assault were circulated to other students.

docs.snippet: A Saturday offering by David Steinberg....

headline.print_headline: Ross Leads Raptors Past Kings, Gay 99-87
headline.main: Ross Leads Raptors Past Kings, Gay 99-87

docs.snippet: Terrence Ross scored 18 points to lead the Raptors to a 99-87 victory over the Sacramento Kings on Friday night, spoiling Rudy Gay's return to Toronto....
docs.lead_paragraph: Terrence Ross scored 18 points to lead the Raptors to a 99-87 victory over the Sacramento Kings on Friday night, spoiling Rudy Gay's return to Toronto.

headline.print_headline: Ex-NFL Player Wanted for Rape Will Stay in California for Now
headline.main: Ex-NFL Player Wanted for Rape Will Stay in California for Now

docs.snippet: Former NFL player Darren Sharper, facing California charges of drugging and raping two women, will not immediately be sent to Louisiana where he is wanted on suspicion of rape in a separate incident, a judge ruled on Friday in an extradition heari...
docs.lead_paragraph: Former NFL player Darren Sharper, facing California charges of drugging and raping two women, will not immediately be sent to Louisiana where he is wanted on suspicion of rape in a separate incident, a judge ruled on Friday in an extradition hearing.

docs.snippet: The New York Rangers are playing playoff hockey right now, according to newly acquired Martin St. Louis, who set up Derek Stepan's winning goal in a 4-2 victory over Carolina on Friday night....
docs.lead_paragraph: The New York Rangers are playing playoff hockey right now, according to newly acquired Martin St. Louis, who set up Derek Stepan's winning goal in a 4-2 victory over Carolina on Friday night.

headline.print_headline: Jefferson, Walker Lead Bobcats Past Cavs 101-92
headline.main: Jefferson, Walker Lead Bobcats Past Cavs 101-92

docs.snippet: Al Jefferson scored 28 points, Kemba Walker had 20 points and 14 assists, and the Charlotte Bobcats defeated the Cleveland Cavaliers 101-92 Friday night for their sixth straight win at home....
docs.lead_paragraph: Al Jefferson scored 28 points, Kemba Walker had 20 points and 14 assists, and the Charlotte Bobcats defeated the Cleveland Cavaliers 101-92 Friday night for their sixth straight win at home.

headline.print_headline: Gasol Has 18 to Help Grizzlies Beat Bulls 85-77
headline.main: Gasol Has 18 to Help Grizzlies Beat Bulls 85-77

docs.snippet: Marc Gasol had 18 points and 10 rebounds, and the Memphis Grizzlies used their stout defense to beat the Chicago Bulls 85-77 Friday night....
docs.lead_paragraph: Marc Gasol had 18 points and 10 rebounds, and the Memphis Grizzlies used their stout defense to beat the Chicago Bulls 85-77 Friday night.

headline.print_headline: No. 19 Michigan State Women Beat Michigan 61-58
headline.main: No. 19 Michigan State Women Beat Michigan 61-58

docs.snippet: Annalise Pickrel scored 18 points and Branndais Agee was clutch down the stretch Friday as No. 19 Michigan State rallied to beat Michigan 61-58 in the Big Ten quarterfinals....
docs.lead_paragraph: Annalise Pickrel scored 18 points and Branndais Agee was clutch down the stretch Friday as No. 19 Michigan State rallied to beat Michigan 61-58 in the Big Ten quarterfinals.

docs.snippet: The men in this issue raise the question of what the value is in conforming to any particular masculine ideal, whichever one it may be....
